us.monoid.web
Class JSONResource

java.lang.Object
  us.monoid.web.Resty
      us.monoid.web.AbstractResource
          us.monoid.web.JSONResource

public class JSONResource
extends AbstractResource

A resource presentation in JSON format. You can ask Resty to parse the JSON into a JSONObject, which is similar to the org.json.JSONObject and allows full access to the JSON. You can also access the JSON with a JSONPathQuery to extract only the parts you are interested in.

Author:
beders

public JSONObject object()
                  throws IOException,

the JSON object
